TunableTuple.name: APPLICATION_RESPONSE_TUNING
TunableTuple.description: Loot actions to be run on scholarship acceptance or rejection. Reward object(s) given through the loot actions must have the Scholarship Letter Component enabled in order to store information about the resolved scholarship and sim applicant on the object.

Tunable.name: accepted_below_value_threshold
Tunable.description: Loot action to be called when a Sim is accepted to a scholarship and the value does not exceed the tuned value threshold.

Tunable.name: accepted_beyond_value_threshold
Tunable.description: Loot action to be called when a Sim is accepted to a scholarship and the value earned exceeds the tuned value threshold.

Tunable.name: rejected
Tunable.description: Loot action to be called when a Sim is rejected from a scholarship.

Tunable.name: value_threshold
Tunable.description: A value threshold that when exceeds runs the 'accepted_beyond_value_ threshold' loot action.

Tunable.name: FULL_RIDE_LOOT
Tunable.description: Loot to run if a sim has applied for scholarships and successfully earned a full ride to attend university.

Tunable.name: MERIT_SCHOLARSHIP
Tunable.description: The merit scholarship to evaluate on enrollment. One Merit Scholarship is earned at enrollment if any prestige degrees are earned.

TunableList.name: DEGREES_EARNED_TO_VALUE_OF_MERIT_SCHOLARSHIP
TunableList.display: Degrees Earned To Value Of Merit Scholarship

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The threshold of prestige degrees earned.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The value to award for a merit scholarship.
